Package equipments.Fridge

Interface FridgeUserCI

All Superinterfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, FridgeUserAndControlI, FridgeUserAndExternalControlI, FridgeUserImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
FridgeUserConnector, FridgeUserInboundPort, FridgeUserOutboundPort
public interface FridgeUserCI extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, FridgeUserImplI
The component interface FridgeUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the fridge.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      getCurrentPowerLevel() <= getMaxPowerLevel()

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES

    • setCurrentPowerLevel

      void setCurrentPowerLevel(double powerLevel) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: FridgeUserAndExternalControlI
      set the power level of the air conditioning; if powerLevel > getMaxPowerLevel() then set the power level to the maximum.

      Contract

       pre    on()
 pre    powerLevel >= 0.0
 post   powerLevel > getMaxPowerLevel() || getCurrentPowerLevel() == powerLevel
      Specified by:
      setCurrentPowerLevel in interface FridgeUserAndExternalControlI
      Parameters:
      powerLevel - the powerLevel to be set.
      Throws:
      Exception - to do.

 post   return >= 0.0 && return <= getMaxPowerLevel()
